Bromod:Ordis.NAME: Broken Cephalon
Bromod:Ordis.FLAVOR: Let me help you - CLEAN THIS MESS - organize your mod library, operator.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you draw a #bPower card, draw an additional card.
At the start of combat and whenever you shuffle your deck, draw a card.

Bromod:AscarisDevice.NAME: Ascaris Device
Bromod:AscarisDevice.FLAVOR: You are my prize now, Tenno.
DESCRIPTIONS: The Ascaris is limiting the powers of your warframe. You can remove it by right-cliking this relic #g(Enables #geasy #gmode).
The Ascaris has been removed and your powers returned. Card and power effects have been restored to their strongest versions.

Bromod:ExtinguishedDragonKey.NAME: Extinguished Dragon Key
Bromod:ExtinguishedDragonKey.FLAVOR: Strengths falter and breath is lost.

Bromod:HobbledDragonKey.NAME: Hobbled Dragon Key
DESCRIPTIONS: Your turn ends immediately after playing your 4th card each turn.

Bromod:ArcaneAegis.NAME: Arcane Aegis
DESCRIPTIONS: After receiving damage 6 times, prevent the next time you'd receive damage.

Bromod:DragonsCurse.NAME: Dragon's Curse
Bromod:DragonsCurse.FLAVOR: The Orokin didn't want their artifacts stolen, so they made sure that the ones who did, couldn't go far.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain the effects of a single random Dragon Key.
#rBleeding #rDragon. NL Reduce your max HP by 75%. Recover lost HP at the end of combat.
#bDecaying #bDragon. NL Reduce ALL block gain by 50%.
#gExtinguished #gDragon. NL Reduce ALL damage dealt by 50%.
#pHobbled #pDragon. NL Your turn ends immediately after playing your 4th card each turn.
